00051 namespace base {
00052 enum LOGLEVEL {
00053     LOGVER  = 1,
00054     LOGDBG  = 2,
00055     LOGINFO = 3,
00056     LOGWARN = 4,
00057     LOGER   = 5,
00058 };

00060 void __gaia_currentPackageName__();
00061 char* __gaia_getPackageName__();

00071 
00072 #define TRY(TAG, condition, label, statements, format, args...) \
00073     if (!(condition)) { \
00074     GLOG(TAG, LOGER, format, ##args); \
00075         statements; \
00076         goto label; \
00077     } else {;}
00078 
00079 
00080 #define GLOG(TAG, level, format, args...) \
00081     do { \
00082         if (CHECKLEVEL(level)) { \
00083             GLOGIMPLEMENT(TAG, level, "TID:%d ...%s:%d:\t"format"\n", static_cast<uint32_t>(syscall(__NR_gettid)), __FILE__, __LINE__, ##args); \
00084         } else {;} \
00085     } while (0)
00086 
00087 #define GLOGIMPLEMENT(TAG, level, ...) \
00088     do { \
00089         if (true == ::gaia::base::__gaia_bFirstGet__()) { \
00090             ::gaia::base::__gaia_currentPackageName__(); \
00091         } else {;} \
00092         if (true == ::gaia::base::__gaia_bGetPackageName__()) { \
00093             GLOGTMP(::gaia::base::__gaia_getPackageName__(), level, __VA_ARGS__); \
00094         } else { \
00095             GLOGTMP(TAG, level, __VA_ARGS__); \
00096         } \
00097     } while (0)
00098 
00099 #define GLOGTMP(TAG, level, format...) \
00100     ::gaia::base::__gaia_glog__(TAG, level, format)
00101 
00102 
00103 #define KPISTART(PATTERN, OBJECT) \
00104     if (CHECKLEVEL(LOGINFO)) { \
00105         ::gaia::base::__gaia_glogstart__(PATTERN, OBJECT); \
00106         } else {;}
00107 
00108 #define KPISTOP(PATTERN, OBJECT) \
00109     if (CHECKLEVEL(LOGINFO)) { \
00110         ::gaia::base::__gaia_glogstop__(PATTERN, OBJECT); \
00111         } else {;}
00112 
00113 #define KPIONCE(PATTERN, OBJECT, MEASURE) \
00114     if (CHECKLEVEL(LOGINFO)) { \
00115         ::gaia::base::__gaia_glogonce__(PATTERN, OBJECT, MEASURE); \
00116         } else {;}
00117 
00118 #define CHECKLEVEL(level) \
00119     ((DEBUG_LEVEL < level)?1:0)
00120 
00121 #define BETWEEN(a, b, c) ((a <= b)&&(b <= c))

00123 class __GaiaCallLog__ {
00124   private:
00125     const char* mplogtag;
00126     const char* mpfile;
00127     int32_t mline;
00128     const char* mpfunc;
00129     int64_t mEnterTime;
00130 
00131   public:
00132     inline __GaiaCallLog__(const char* __logtag, const char* __file, int32_t __line, const char* __func):
00133     mplogtag(__logtag), mpfile(__file), mline(__line), mpfunc(__func), mEnterTime(0) {
00134         if (CHECKLEVEL(gaia::base::LOGDBG)) {
00135             __gaia_glog__(mplogtag, gaia::base::LOGDBG, "TID:%d ...%s:%d:\tEnter %s\n", static_cast<int32_t>(syscall(__NR_gettid)), strrchr(mpfile, '/'), mline, mpfunc);
00136         }
00137     }
00138 
00139     inline void timeDiff(int32_t diffLine) {
00140     }
00141 
00142     inline ~__GaiaCallLog__() {
00143         if (CHECKLEVEL(gaia::base::LOGDBG)) {
00144             __gaia_glog__(mplogtag, gaia::base::LOGDBG, "TID:%d ...%s:%d:\tLeave %s\n", static_cast<int32_t>(syscall(__NR_gettid)), strrchr(mpfile, '/'), mline, mpfunc);
00145         }
00146     }
00147 };
